mapper.select:
SELECT bmn.`id`,bmn.majorid,bmn.`NAME`,bmn.type,bmn.state,bmn.isdel,bmn.createtime,bmn.updatetime,bmn.create_id,n1,n2,n3,n4,n5,n6,n7,n8,n9,n10,n11,n12,n13,n14,n15,n16,n17,n18,n19,n20,n21,n22,n23,n24,n25,n26,n27,n28,n29,n30,n31,n32,n33,n34,n35,n36,n37,n38,n39,n40,n41,n42,n43,n44,bmn.score_end,t1,t2,t3,t4,t22 FROM b_major_number bmn LEFT JOIN b_major_text bmt ON bmn.majorId = bmt.majorId
and t1 like concat('%',#{majorConclusionVOWapper.t1},'%')
and t2 like concat('%',#{majorConclusionVOWapper.t2},'%')
ORDER BY ${majorConclusionVOWapper.sort} ${majorConclusionVOWapper.sortOrder},bmn.`updatetime` DESC
ORDER BY bmn.`updatetime` DESC
